sourcesContent:
import { Card, Container, Typography, Divider, Grid, IconButton, Slide } from '@material-ui/core'
import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux'
import DeleteIcon from '@material-ui/icons/DeleteForever'
import EditIcon from '@material-ui/icons/ListRounded'
import useStyles from './styles'


const EditCard = ({ employee, currentId, setCurrentId, setShowEmployeeForm, setShowEmployeeGrid }) => {
    const classes = useStyles()
    const dispatch = useDispatch()

    const warningDialog = () => {
        return(
            <Dialog
                open={open}
                TransitionComponent={Transition}
                keepMounted
                onClose={handleClose}
                aria-labelledby="alert-dialog-slide-title"
                aria-describedby="alert-dialog-slide-description"
            >
            <DialogTitle id="alert-dialog-slide-title">{"Use Google's location service?"}</DialogTitle>
            <DialogContent>
                <DialogContentText id="alert-dialog-slide-description">
                    Let Google help apps determine location. This means sending anonymous location data to
                    Google, even when no apps are running.
                </DialogContentText>
            </DialogContent>
            <DialogActions>
                <Button onClick={handleClose} color="primary">
                    Disagree
                </Button>
                <Button onClick={handleClose} color="primary">
                    Agree
                </Button>
                </DialogActions>
            </Dialog>
        )
    }

    const handleEditButton = () => {
        setCurrentId(employee._id)
        setShowEmployeeGrid(false)
        setShowEmployeeForm(true)
    }

    const handleDeleteButton = () => {
        setCurrentId(employee._id)
        warningDialog()
        setShowEmployeeForm(false)
        setShowEmployeeGrid(true)
    }

    return (
        <Card className={classes.card}>
            <Container className={classes.cardFrontTop}>
                <Typography>{employee.firstName} {employee.lastName}</Typography>
                <Divider className={classes.divider}/>
            </Container>
            <Grid container direction="column" justify="center" alignItems="center" xs={12}>
                <Slide direction="down" in timeout={400}>
                    <IconButton onClick={ handleEditButton } >
                        <EditIcon style={{ color:'lightgrey', fontSize:80 }} />
                    </IconButton>
                </Slide>
                <Slide direction="up" in timeout={600}>
                    <IconButton onClick={ handleDeleteButton } >
                        <DeleteIcon color='error'/>
                    </IconButton>
                </Slide>
            </Grid>
        </Card>
    )
}

export default EditCard
